name: Prototype RTS
description:
RTS PROTOTYPE by Digitum Software (2021)

Runs under Windows 64-bit OS only

Thanks for trying this prototype RTS in its early stages of development.

Send your units to neutral or enemy factory flags to capture them.

You can only capture neutral/enemy zones/factories that are adjacent to your territory.

Wing the game by capturing the enemy home base while protecting your home base.

Use your mouse to:

  1. drag-select groups of units
  2. Click to select a single unit or shift-click to select/deselect units
  3. Order selected units to attack or move to positions

Additional info:

  • Press escape to pause and access the menu screen.
  • Press alt-enter to go into window from fullscreen.
  • The prototype is restricted to 1920x1080 resolution.
  • Select a factory and change production with the number keys
